0: Room 3 was ok but it took over 25 minutes of waiting
The room was large but carpet was old veneer on furniture bubbling doors are metal with scratches and peeling paint
May I direct you to your room Not a concept

The only area in the main building that was renovated this year and is not what it used to be is the Oasis Lobby Bar at one point it was beautiful classy and ready to have a good time at either the bar area or the dancing floor to enjoy the night Now the bar is ok but the dancing area was eliminated and replaced with a sitting area with 4 huge tv sand showing sport games all nightNow you can call it a sport bar area
My room had a clogged bathtub
The resort fee is 24 and change per day there is a tax on the resort fee and there is a tax on the room fee
My mother was having an asthma attack when we were in the room
While talking to 2 other hotel guests staying in 2 different rooms we learned that they had both experienced red bumps hives on their skin
We stayed on the 8th floor with partial view double queens 2 rooms
We went down to the lobby and asked whether they can make up by giving us a nicer room
1: Views from Wave wing are amazing
The swim up bar hot tubs and pool were fun
Plenty of restaurant option and the lobby bar has amazing views and is very open with large windows
The bartender Hiram took very good care of us even taught us some cocktail flair tricksWould recommend to any travelers looking for a relaxing time with a great view
Almost all rooms of three pretty great view of the ocean
I am only rating the Caribe Hilton as very good because of the location and the rooms
